data.name: WIZ_SRV_LOGIN_SUCCEEDED

data.value: Database {0} already exists. Enter a different name

data.name: WIZ_AD_SID_NOT_FOUND

data.name: WIZ_DB_LOGIN_FAILED
data.value: Cannot connect to the DATABASE {0} user {1}.

data.value: Incorrect database or you do not have access.

data.name: WIZ_INVALID_CONNECTION_STRING
data.value: Could not open a connection to the database. Check the connection string.

data.name: WIZ_DB_USER_ALREADY_EXISTS
data.value: The specified login {0} already exists. Enter a different name.

data.name: WIZ_SRV_SELECT
data.value: Do not specify a database server

data.name: WIZ_DB_PASSWORD_NO_LOWER
data.value: The password must contain characters in lowercase

data.name: WIZ_DB_PASSWORD_NO_SPECIAL
data.value: The password must contain special characters

data.name: WIZ_DB_PASSWORD_NO_UPPER
data.value: The password must contain uppercase characters

data.name: WIZ_DB_PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT
data.value: The password must contain at least {0} characters

data.name: WIZ_DB_INVALID_DATABASE_NAME_EXT
data.value: Invalid database name. In the name of the only characters, numbers and underscores

data.name: WIZ_DB_INVALID_LOGIN_EXT
data.value: Invalid user login. The name can contain only characters, numbers and underscores

data.name: WIZ_SRV_DB_USER_IS_NOT_ADMIN
data.value: The selected user has no administrative rights that is required to create the database. Add the user to the Server sysadmin group.

data.name: WIZ_SRV_WINDOWS_USER_IS_NOT_ADMIN
data.value: The current Windows user does not have administrative rights required to create the database. Add the user to the Server sysadmin group.

data.name: WIZ_DB_GRANT_PERMISSION_ERROR
data.value: An error occurred while granting rights to the current user to have access to an existing database. After Setup completes, you must configure the service access to the database manually, or restart the wizard database connection under a user account with rights of securityadmin.

data.name: WIZ_SRV_INVALID_DB_PERMISSIONS
data.value: You do not have sufficient permissions

data.name: WIZ_DB_PASSWORD_TOO_LONG
data.value: The password must not contain more than {0} characters

data.name: WIZ_DB_ENTER_EXISTS_PASSWORD
data.value: The password must contain at least 8 and not more than 80 characters

data.name: I_ITA_SERVER_RESTART_WARNING
data.value: Launching Wizard will restart the management server. Do you Want To Continue?

data.name: E_ITA_UPDATE_INVALID_SCRIPT
data.value: Failed to read the database upgrade script resource.

data.name: E_ITA_DB_HAS_OLD_VERSION
data.value: Current database version {0} is not supported by the server. The required version is {1}.

data.name: E_ITA_UPDATE_INVALID_DATABASE
data.value: Unable to determine the version of the database. The database has an incorrect structure.

data.name: E_ITA_UPDATE_UNKNOWN_VERSION
data.value: Unable to determine the version of the database.

data.name: E_ITA_UPDATE_OLD_VERSION
data.value: Current version {0} cannot be updated. The minimum supported version is {1}.

data.name: E_ITA_UPDATE_UNSUPPORTED_VERSION
data.value: Upgrading your current version of the database is not supported.

data.name: E_ITA_UPDATE_FATAL_ERROR
data.value: Fatal error when upgrading a database.

data.name: E_ITA_DATABASE_IS_UNAVAILABLE
data.value: The database is unavailable or has unsupported version

data.name: E_ITA_DATABASE_VERSION_ERROR
data.value: An error has occurred while validating the database
